pixels, rect

Types

DisplayEventID {.size: 1.} = enum
  DISPLAYEVENT_NONE, DISPLAYEVENT_ORIENTATION, DISPLAYEVENT_CONNECTED,
  DISPLAYEVENT_DISCONNECTED, DISPLAYEVENT_MOVED
Display event subtype. 
DisplayMode {.final, pure.} = object
  format*: PixelFormatEnum   ## Pixel format.
  w*: cint                   ## Screen width.
  h*: cint                   ## Screen height.
  refresh_rate*: cint        ## Refresh rate (zero == unspecified).
  ## Driver specific data, init. to nil.
Display mode. 
DisplayOrientation {.size: 4.} = enum
  ORIENTATION_UNKNOWN, ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE, ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE_FLIPPED,
  ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT, ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT_FLIPPED
Display orientation. 
FlashOperation {.size: 4.} = enum
  FLASH_CANCEL, FLASH_BRIEFLY, FLASH_UNTIL_FOCUSED
Window flash operation. 
GLattr {.pure, size: 4.} = enum
  GL_RED_SIZE, GL_GREEN_SIZE, GL_BLUE_SIZE, GL_ALPHA_SIZE, GL_BUFFER_SIZE,
  GL_DOUBLEBUFFER, GL_DEPTH_SIZE, GL_STENCIL_SIZE, GL_ACCUM_RED_SIZE,
  GL_ACCUM_GREEN_SIZE, GL_ACCUM_BLUE_SIZE, GL_ACCUM_ALPHA_SIZE, GL_STEREO,
  GL_MULTISAMPLEBUFFERS, GL_MULTISAMPLESAMPLES, GL_ACCELERATED_VISUAL,
  GL_RETAINED_BACKING, GL_CONTEXT_MAJOR_VERSION, GL_CONTEXT_MINOR_VERSION,
  GL_CONTEXT_EGL, GL_CONTEXT_FLAGS, GL_CONTEXT_PROFILE_MASK,
  GL_SHARE_WITH_CURRENT_CONTEXT, GL_FRAMEBUFFER_SRGB_CAPABLE,
  GL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR, GL_CONTEXT_RESET_NOTIFICATION,
  GL_CONTEXT_NO_ERROR, GL_FLOATBUFFERS
OpenGL configuration attributes. 
GLcontextFlag {.size: 4.} = enum
  GL_CONTEXT_DEBUG_FLAG = 1, GL_CONTEXT_FORWARD_COMPATIBLE_FLAG = 2,
  GL_CONTEXT_ROBUST_ACCESS_FLAG = 4, GL_CONTEXT_RESET_ISOLATION_FLAG = 8
GLcontextReleaseFlag {.size: 4.} = enum
  GL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_NONE = 0, GL_CONTEXT_RELEASE_BEHAVIOR_FLUSH = 1
GLContextResetNotification {.size: 4.} = enum
  GL_CONTEXT_RESET_NO_NOTIFICATION = 0, GL_CONTEXT_RESET_LOSE_CONTEXT = 1
GLprofile {.size: 4.} = enum
  GL_CONTEXT_PROFILE_CORE = 1, GL_CONTEXT_PROFILE_COMPATIBILITY = 2,
  GL_CONTEXT_PROFILE_ES = 4
HitTest = proc (win: WindowPtr; area: ptr Point; data: pointer): HitTestResult {.
    cdecl, ...gcsafe, raises: [].}
Hit testing callback. 
HitTestResult {.size: 4.} = enum
  HITTEST_NORMAL, HITTEST_DRAGGABLE, HITTEST_RESIZE_TOPLEFT, HITTEST_RESIZE_TOP,
  HITTEST_RESIZE_TOPRIGHT, HITTEST_RESIZE_RIGHT, HITTEST_RESIZE_BOTTOMRIGHT,
  HITTEST_RESIZE_BOTTOM, HITTEST_RESIZE_BOTTOMLEFT, HITTEST_RESIZE_LEFT
WindowEventID {.size: 1.} = enum
  WINDOWEVENT_NONE, WINDOWEVENT_SHOWN, WINDOWEVENT_HIDDEN, WINDOWEVENT_EXPOSED,
  WINDOWEVENT_MOVED, WINDOWEVENT_RESIZED, WINDOWEVENT_SIZE_CHANGED,
  WINDOWEVENT_MINIMIZED, WINDOWEVENT_MAXIMIZED, WINDOWEVENT_RESTORED,

Window event subtype.
